comments.author: Dave
comments.body: So the guy at the welding shop says "This Japanese stuff don't always react so great to the torch. Might look okay from the outside, but you cain't never trust the insides. 'Fact, I thought they'd outlawed this Tange steel after that one jet went down in the Pacific. All them poor people drownded an' shark bait and like that all 'cause of a little $3 piece o' cheapass Tange steel. But I _think_ you'll be okay 'long as you don't take them turns fast or nuthin' like that." Hmmmm.....

comments.author: Greg
comments.body: Awesome pics from yesterday guys. Really wish I was there, rather than fighting the Battle of the Breach '08. Next time. -G
